$$.value: A special effect in which you'll see a brightly smiling sun floating over you. On the KeyConfig, configure this on a button of your choice to turn the effect on/off.
A special effect in which you'll see a brightly smiling moon floating around in a sea of stars over you. On the KeyConfig, configure this on a button of your choice to turn the effect on/off.
A special effect in which you'll see a rainbow in its full 7 colors floating next to you. Designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.
A special effect in which you'll see Lilly the cute little devil floating around next to you. Designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.
A special effect that shows a submarine under the water.  Designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.
A special effect that displays the longing to be with someone special.  Designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.
A lovely effect that shows a baby angel floating around as your protector.  Designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.
A special effect that puts a poster in front of your face as if you're being wanted around the world.  Designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.
A special effect used to increase the chance of winning with Slot Machine by 2x. Designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.
A special effect that appears Chinese Falg. Designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.
A special effect in which you'll see two babies floating on the cloud as a sign of friendship. Designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.
A special effect that displays that the owner would like to be left alone. Designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.
A special equalizer effect that is given as a prize at the Maple Member Shop. Designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.
A special effect of the fireworks that is given as a prize at the Maple Member Shop. Designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.
A special effect that displays the stormy cloud with rain and lightning hovering around the owner's head. Designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.
A special effect used to increase the number of balls obtained from winning with Slot Machine by 2x. Designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.
A siren effect that can be used under emergencies.  Designate a HotKey to turn the effect ON/OFF.
A special star effect for a special day.  Designate a HotKey to turn the effect ON/OFF.
A smile effect best used when you're in a great mood! Designate a a HotKey to turn the effect ON/OFF.
A heart effect you can use to show your love to the others.  Designate a HotKey to turn the effect ON/OFF.
A special effect that follows your character for the supporting of Korea's victory.  Designate a HotKey to turn the effect ON/OFF.

This skull was found somewhere around the remains, and it'll be with you until you wish for otherwise. Double-click on the item or on the Key Config, configure this on a button of your choice to turn the effect on/off.
A number of twinkling stars surrounds the character in this special effect.

A special effect that captures the feeling of wanting to express the feeling of love to someone special. Double-click on the item or on the Key Config, configure this on a button of your choice to turn the effect on/off.
A family of toy ducks follow around the character. Double-click on the item or on the Key Config, configure this on a button of your choice to turn the effect on/off.

A special effect in which you'll see a spooky ghost appirate behind you and scare the daylights out of everyone nearby! On the Key Config, configure this on a button of your choice to turn the effect on/off.

A special effect in which you'll see a horde of Dracula's finest bats appear and surround your character with alluring nocturne ambience. On the Key Config, configure this on a button of your choice to turn the effect on/off.
A special effect that perfectly represents the feeling of anger. On the Key Config, configure this on a button of your choice to turn the effect on/off.
This is an effect item that exudes an aura around the character. On the Key Config, configure this on a button of your choice to turn the effect on/off.
This is an effect item that exudes an aura around the character. On the Key Config, configure this on a button of your choice to turn the effect on/off.
This is an effect item that exudes an aura around the character. On the Key Config, configure this on a button of your choice to turn the effect on/off.
Show the world how much you adore your boyfriend with this attractive marker! On the Key Config, configure this on a button of your choice to turn the effect on/off.
Show the world how much you adore your girlfriend with this attractive marker! On the Key Config, configure this on a button of your choice to turn the effect on/off.
A special effect perfect for instances where you were caught off-guard. On the Key Config, configure this on a button of your choice to turn the effect on/off.
If you ever felt like becoming a Christmas Tree, here's your chance! On the Key Config, configure this on a button of your choice to turn the effect on/off.
On a cold, snowy day, this effect will enable you to become a snowman. On the Key Config, configure this on a button of your choice to turn the effect on/off.
A special effect that pours massive amount of water on top of the head.  Double-click on the icon or designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.
A special effect that features a spotlight above the head of the character. Double-click on the icon or designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.
A special effect that follows the character around which can be used to express the feeling of happiness and joy.  Double-click on the icon or designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.
A very busy bee that's never distracted from following you. Keeps one focused on the task at hand.
A special effect that features a blinding glow on the character’s eyes. Double-click on the icon or designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.
Traces of the character remains while the character moves, creating multiple images of the character in the process. Double-click on the icon, or designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.
A special effect that displays the lightning striking on the character’s head.  Double-click on the icon or designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.
A special effect that puts a poster in front of your face as if you're being Maple Champion around the world.  Designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.
A special effect that puts a poster in front of your face as if you're being Maple Champion around the world.  Designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.
A special effect that puts a poster in front of your face as if you're being Maple Champion around the world.  Designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.
Celebrate your holiday cheer with this effect! Designate a HotKey to turn the effect ON/OFF.
Give Santa a lift with this hilarious effect! Designate a HotKey to turn the effect ON/OFF.
Create the perfect excuse for a holiday kiss! Designate a HotKey to turn the effect ON/OFF.
A special effect that displays Santa and his two trusty reindeers breaking down to the beat, hovering around the owner's head. Designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.
A special effect that features a UFO and a number of colorful aliens accompanying the owner of the item. Designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.
A special effect that features a trail of flowers and grass left behind by the owner of the item. Designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.
A special effect that shows a cute fairy sprinkling flowers. On the Key Config, configure this on a button of your choice to turn the effect on/off.
Not sold in Cash Shop. An effect shown while changing into a monster.
A cool blue water balloon. Thrown with a #cthrowing star# to have the water balloon effect. Item cannot be removed.
A nicely-folded paper plane. Thrown with a #cthrowing star# to have the paper plane effect. Item cannot be removed.
A ball of concentrated energy. Thrown with a #cthrowing star# to have the energy effect. Item cannot be removed.
A red starfish that can be seen at the beach. Can be equipped with a #cthrowing star# to have the starfish effect.\n\nThis item cannot be removed.
A baseball with small wings attached to it. Can be equipped with a #cthrowing star# to have the winged baseball effect.\n\nThis item cannot be destroyed.
The official football of the MapleBowl. When held in your inventory, #cthrowing stars# will appear as a thrown football.
A chalkboard eraser commonly found in classrooms. Thrown with a #cthrowing star# to have the eraser effect. Item cannot be removed.
A small pink heart of love that explodes on contact. Thrown with a #cthrowing star# to have the heart effect. \n\nItem cannot be removed.
An adorable brown teddy bear that explodes on contact. Thrown with a #cthrowing star# to have the teddy bear effect. \n\nItem cannot be removed.
Never in Pepe's wildest dreams did it think it'd be chucked down the field in place of the throwing star. Thrown with a throwing star to have the Pepe effect. Item cannot be removed.

A throwing star make to look like Mr. Puff, with its huffy puffy cheeks resembling that of a tasty-looking steamed bun. Thrown with a #cthrowing star# to have the Mr. Puff effect.\n\nItem cannot be removed.
An enchanted skull straight from the Headless Horseman. Thrown with a throwing star to have the skull striker effect. Item cannot be removed.
Harmless pie? Think again. Thrown with a throwing star to have the pumpkin bomb effect.
An explosive bomb used by the legendary pirates. Thrown with a #cthrowing star# to have the explosive bomb effect.\n\nItem cannot be removed.
That nasty poop can be detected from afar. Thrown with a #cthrowing star# to have the nasty poop effect.\n\nItem cannot be removed.
A white egg thrown in place of the throwing star, and that explodes on contact. Thrown with a #cthrowing star# to have the Chick effect. \n\nItem cannot be removed.
A mischievous ball that has gained sentience, and now lives to be thrown for massive damage. Tremendous striking power! Equips over #cThrowing Stars#!
An explosive throwing star used by the Dragon. Thrown with a #cthrowing star# to have the explosive bomb effect.\n\nItem cannot be removed.
Explosive throwing stars from New Leaf City. They're the Bomb!  This item equips over #cThrowing Stars#!
A cute and cuddly sheep. Don't let it fool you--it's lethal. This item equips over #cThrowing Stars#!
Set up this special store on the Free Market, and this Elf, working as the Hired Merchant, will sell the items for the owner, even if the owner does not log on to the game.

Remembers 5 maps of your choice. This rock will enable you to #cteleport to the map you remembered#. It can even allow you to #cmove to the map where a certain character is#, provided that the person is in the same channel at the same world. This item cannot be used to teleport in between continents.

By drinking sweet refreshing #cCoca-Cola#, it ables you to #cteleport to one of the remembered maps#. You can also #cteleport to the map where specific character is located# in the same channel.  Unable the teleport to the maps where teleport is limited.

This Teleport Rock enables one to #cteleport between continents#. It also enables the user to teleport to a specific character from the same channel. Up to #c10# maps, excluding the maps that cannot be reached through teleport, can be registered for this.

This is the #cscroll that allows you to reset 1 AP from the ability stat#. Choose one AP from HP, MP, STR, DEX, INT, or LUK , and allocate it to the desired category. The lowest an AP level can reach on any category is 4.
This scroll allows you to #creset 1 SP from a 1st-job skill#. The SP that's been reset may NOT be applied to 2nd or 3rd job skills.

This scroll allows you to #creset 1 SP from a 2nd-level skill#. The 1st job SP raised AFTER the 2nd job adv. can also be reset and applied to a 2nd job skill. The SP that's been reset may NOT be applied to 1st or 3rd job skills.

This scroll allows you to #creset 1 SP from a 3rd-level skill#. The 1st & 2nd job SP raised AFTER the 3rd job adv. can also be reset and applied to a 3rd job skill. The SP that's been reset may NOT be applied to 1st or 2nd job skills.

This scroll allows you to #creset 1 SP from a 4th-level skill#. The 1st, 2nd, and 3rd job SP raised AFTER the 4th job adv. can also be reset and applied to a 3rd job skill. The SP that's been reset may NOT be applied to 1st, 2nd or 3rd job skills.

This will enable the owner of the weapon to engrave his/her name on an equipment item once. Click on the item, and drag the item #con top of the equipment of choice# to engrave your character name on it.

A lock that seals away any equipment items and throwing stars, excluding the quest items. By sealing the item away, the item will be #cdisabled from selling, trading, or throwing away#. Double-click on the lock to un-seal the item.
An equipment needed to open the #ceggs from pigme#.  Pigme eggs canve incubated by double clicking the incubator.
Shout to everyone in the map your character is on with this megaphone.
Shout to everyone in the map your character is on with this megaphone. Only available for characters that are over Level 10.
Shout to everyone in the world your character is on with this megaphone. Only available for characters that are over Level 10.
Shout to everyone in the world your character is on with this megaphone. (Heart accents)
Shout to everyone in the world your character is on with this megaphone. (Skull accents)

Show your avatar on Maple TV with messages.\nIn case of dedication messages, character you have designated will also appear on the screen throughout the entire world.  The message will last appx. 15 seconds.

Beautifully designed TV with star effects. \nThis allows you to type in longer messages with longer period of time, 30 seconds.  Only announcement type of message is available with this item.  The message will last for 30 seconds.

Beautifully designed TV with Heart effect.\nPropose in style on the TV.  This item only allows dedication type of message where designated user also appears on the TV.  The message will last for 1 minute.
Show your message on the chatting window as well as Maple TV at the same time.
Show your message on the chatting window as well as Maple TV at the same time.  This comes with star effect on the Maple TV.
Show your message on the chatting window as well as Maple TV at the same time.  This comes with heart effect on the Maple TV.
Use this megaphone to broadcast to everyone in the Server World about an item that may be for sale.

is wishing you a happy new year.

Open a regular store. Can open anywhere of choice in the free market. Can sell up to 16 items at once.

Adds the item pick-up skill to a pet. \n#cAvailable to pets that can only pick up Mesos.#
Adds to automatic potion-feeding skill to the pet. \n#cAvailable to all pets that do not have this option.#
Use this scroll to expand the pet's moving range by 3 times. \n#cOnly available to pets that have automatic pick-up skills, cannot be used on top of each other.#
A skill that enables pets to pick up items and mesos within the area without the character having to move. \n#cAvailable to pets with Mesos pick-up, item pick-up skills.#
(+) Pick up Leftover Item & Meso Skills

Adds the skill that enables pets to pick up mesos and items that have been dropped for more than 30 seconds, thus rendering it as leftovers.\n#cAvailable to pets that have Meso pick-up skills as well as item pick-up skills.#
The skill that makes pet not picking up any selected item. \n#s only pet mounted meso or item collecting function can use the skill.#
The skill that automatically recharges one's MP provided you have set the option up in the system option. \n#c The skill applies to all pet that does not have the skillt#.
Use this scroll to disable the pet from picking up items.
Use this scroll to disable the pet from automatically feeding the character when the HP reaches critical stage.
Use this scroll to return the range of pet's movement back to normal.
Use this scroll to disable the pet from picking up items and mesos.
(-) Delete Pick up Leftover Item & Meso
Use this scroll to disable pets from picking up leftover items and mesos, the ones that have been dropped for more than 30 seconds.

This scroll will enable you to change your character name to something totally new! Please be aware that the character must be at level 10 or higher to be eligible for the name change and the new name should be an acceptable new name that has passed the name check. The name-change will occur during the following server check, and you will then be restricted from changing names for one month.
